CustomField.formula: Case(Contact.language__c, "de",IF(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Legal"), HYPERLINK("https://legal.trustedshops.com/privacy", "Datenschutzinformationen","_self"), HYPERLINK("https://www.trustedshops.de/impressum#datenschutz","Datenschutzinformationen","_self")), "en",HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", "Data privacy","_self"), "fr",HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", "Protection des Données","_self"), "nl",HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", " Privacyverklaring","_self"), "it",HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", "Dichiarazione sulla privacy","_self"), "pl",HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", "Polityka prywatnosci","_self"), "es", HYPERLINK("https://business.trustedshops.com/consent", "Protección de datos","_self"), "", IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Legal"), HYPERLINK("https://legal.trustedshops.com/privacy", "Datenschutzinformationen","_self"), IF( AND(NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Legal")), OR($UserRole.Name = "CX Manager Market 1", CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "High Touch 1 Market 1"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Account Management"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Mid Touch 1 Market 1"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Tech Touch 1 Market 1"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Contract"))), HYPERLINK("https://www.trustedshops.de/impressum#datenschutz", "Datenschutzinformationen","_self"),"")),"")
CustomField.label: zz_Signatur_GDPR
